channel.title: Home on MSSH
channel.description: Recent content in Home on MSSH

item.title: Recommended content
item.description: Math Discrete Differential Geometry by Keenan Crane 3Blue1Brown Timothy Gowers: Thought process of a great mathematician Weitz: German math videos (mostly from the C.S. perspective) by Prof. Dr. Edmund Weitz Introduction to graph theory by Richard J. Trudeau Algebra: Chappter 0 by Aluffi Laplace-Beltrami Operator / Bachelor thesis Shape DNA Paper by Reuter et al. Riemannian Geometry and Geometric Analysis by Jost Dolfinx Tutorial by J.S. Dokken Automated Solution of Differential Equations by the Finite Element Method: The FEniCS book The Mathematical Theory of Finite Element Methods by Brenner / Scott Manifolds by Lee Introduction to Smooth Manifolds Introduction to Riemannian Manifolds Content for my tutorials (German) All diese Quellen sind von mir persönlich und nicht den Dozenten empfohlen!

item.title: My current tech stack
item.description: A list of software i’m using, not endorsements of the product/company/person. OS Windows 11 / Ubuntu Tools Windows Terminal OneNote: for handwritten notes Xournal++: for handwritten notes One by wacom Obsidian: structured/rehearsal notes Chrono: documenting and analyzing my habits Whatsapp (Desktop) Google Chrome Hugo: mssh.dev Github (Website + Desktop): Hosting mssh.dev, version-control Zotero: Organizing my bachelor thesis / bibliography Languages / Editors VS Code: Editor python(3.8): Language of choice for most projects javascript with p5.

item.title: Infos über mein Sommersemester 23 (German)
item.description: Ich höre gerade folgende Vorlesungen: Einführung in die Geometrie und Topologie Tutorien Ich tutoriere diese Semester Analysis für Informatiker für Dr. Welter Angewandte Mathematik: Stochastik für Prof. Dr. Klein Materialien findet ihr ggf. hier
